name: Multi-OS Package Build Tree
short_description:
The intent of this project is to put together a tree of Makefiles,
patches, etc. (similar to the ports trees shipped with
{Free,Open,Net}BSD) to facilitate building various packages on
a variety of operating systems (*BSD, Linux, Solaris, etc.)

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All POSIX (Linux/BSD/UNIX-like OSes)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All BSD Platforms (FreeBSD/NetBSD/OpenBSD/Apple Mac OS X)
os.fullname: All BSD Platforms (FreeBSD/NetBSD/OpenBSD/Apple Mac OS X)
